game.name: Tiny Man And Red Bat
game.description:
In this one of the best adventure games for boys, you are surely going to have the matchless fun and thrill. Your objective in this brand new platform game is to reach out to the key and collect it to the next level. There are many obstacles in the form of a number of trunks and secret passages to welcome you on the way. Don’t take your enemies for granted since they are not going to show pity on you when you come into their range! Apply your intense adventure skill to bring the ball of victory into your court!

Tiny Man and Red Bat is an ultimate fun platform game where you have to use your brain to complete all the levels. With easy controls and instructions backed by the fabulous graphics and seamless gameplay, it’s enough to keep you engrossed for hours. Shoot arrows using X, Jump using B, left and right using A/D, jump and climb ladder using W and down ladder using S! It will be amazing to see a red bat and the tiny man pass through all the obstacles in a quest for the key. Many new things to explore in this cool HTML5 game for boys. 

Play this free online adventure game in your PC using the arrow keys of the keyboard of mouse. You can explore it in your mobile or tablet by touching the screens through swiping or tapping. Feel free to refresh your game page to correct the orientation! We have many other plenty of best games for boys. So, in order to explore more fun and entertainment, you can stay connected with us. We guarantee you to land you on a platform where there will be no chances of getting bored.
